mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_group t join ujcms_group_access ga on t.id_ = ga.group_id_ where ga.channel_id_ = #{channelId}
mapper.update: update ujcms_group set name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, all_access_permission_ = #{allAccessPermission,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_group (id_, name_, description_, all_access_permission_, type_, order_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allAccessPermission,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.name_, t.description_, t.all_access_permission_, t.type_, t.order_
